q: what does this person do before putting a cake on an orange skin
pred: The person in the video is preparing a cake by placing it on top of an orange skin. They first cut the orange skin and then place the cake on top of it. The cake is then covered with icing and decorated with a variety of toppings. The person is seen using a spatula to spread the icing on the cake and placing the toppings on top of it. The final product is a beautifully decorated cake.
